page.title: 11Holy Trinity Church
page.content: On Wednesday, May 15th. we visited Holy Trinity Church to interview Father Dowding. When we arrived we looked at the outside of the church. We noticed the spire and read the Service Notice Board. Father Dowding met us by the gate and we went inside. Father Dowding told us about the different parts of the church. Then it was time for the interview. Most of us went into the church hall with Mrs Dowding and Father Dowding. We used a tape-recorder to record the interview. A group of boys were left in the church with Mrs Taylor to sketch parts of the church. When we had finished the interview we returned to the church to ake photographs.
